statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if [ "$current_dir" = "." ]; then current_dir=$(pwd); fi; cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null; dir_display="~${current_dir#$HOME}"; if [ "$current_dir" = "$HOME" ]; then dir_display="~"; fi; git_info=""; if [ -d ".git" ]; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'main'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then git_status=" ✗"; else git_status=" ✔"; fi; git_info=" ($branch$git_status)"; fi; printf "%s%s" "$dir_display" "$git_info"
